recipe.title: Guacamole with Pear and Pomegranate Seeds
ingredients: 3 to 4 serrano chiles, finely chopped, with seeds
3/4 cup pear, peeled and finely diced
molcajete y tojolote_ (mexican mortar and pestle) or food processor
instructions: In a molcajete or food processor, grind onion, chiles, and salt into a rough paste. Gradually add the avocado, coarsely mashing it (you'll want it to be chunky). Stir in the lime juice. Fold in the pear, grapes, and 1/2 cup of the pomegranate seeds. Sprinkle remaining 1/4 cup pomegranate seeds over the guacamole and serve.
